2019 Event Coming Soon

About

The project intends to develop capacity through the transfer and development of knowledge, skills and technical know-how among experienced entrepreneurs and entrepreneurs-to-be from various Asia-Pacific economies. Entrepreneurial education is a process relying on the transfer of knowledge and ingenuity from successful entrepreneurs to entrepreneurs-to-be, leading to long-term capacity building and innovation initiatives. We are focusing on the most needed and transformative sectors of the digital economy, which offer promise of sustained and sustainable growth and inclusive employment. One of the major themes of the workshop is female entrepreneurship, related to inspiring female creativity and improving gender inclusion. Experience sharing during the workshop will further facilitate both internal and regional replicability through dissemination of acquired skills within the participants’ home economies and other regional sectors.

2018 Asia-Pacific Youth Forum on Digital Innovation and Entrepreneurship

Date

  • October 4th – 5th 2018 for both local and Asia-Pacific guests
  • October 6th 2018 for Asia-Pacific guests

Target

Students/ startup instructors/ entrepreneurs and entrepreneurs-to-be under 30

Venue

GiS Taipei Tech, National Taipei University of Technology

Charges & Expenses

  • Free admission
  • Free food during the activity

Accommodation

  • Qualified local attendees from outside Greater Taipei and participating in the 2-day event will be provided with free accommodation for up to 2 nights (Oct. 3rd – Oct. 5th).
  • Asia-Pacific attendees are provided with free accommodation for 4 nights (Oct. 3rd – Oct. 7th).
